item.title: How to Setup a OpenBSD Website
item.description: This is a simple tutorial on creating a youbsite in the cloud using OpenBSD and HTTPD. This is based on the same steps used to create the website you’re reading this on. The main focus is on security, minimalism and reliability. The reason OpenBSD was chosen is because It has amazing security settings out of the box and it’s very lightweight. This tutorial assumes you are a beginner but have some basic knowledge of DNS and unix commands.
